channel.title: UnknownHostException
channel.description: I really need help solving this issue. I have a feeling it's the final error in my journey to connecting to my first client. Any help would be appreciated. Thank you!

item.title: UnknownHostException
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Your IP,

And if it’s the client hrowing the error then you need to search in your client source.

Read full topic

item.title: UnknownHostException
item.dc:creator: @Zen-Birth Zen-Birth
item.description:
@Zen-Birth wrote:

The error code says: “(MysqlI0.java:290)”

Insidious was, what I’m guessing to be, the source and client creators website.

Where exactly would I search for that website and change it? Do I search for it in the source folder or the client folder?

And if I don’t have a website, do I just set it to my IP? Or google?

Read full topic

item.title: UnknownHostException
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Try looking where the exception references to. (for example client.java:455 where 455 is the line number).

As for your error, it means that your host name “www.insidious.com” doesn’t exist properly. Is this your website or was it pre-applied on your source? if the latter, search for that name and change it to whatever you use.

Read full topic

item.title: UnknownHostException
item.dc:creator: @Zen-Birth Zen-Birth
item.description:
@Zen-Birth wrote:

You’re going to hate me, but I’m fairly new to this/:

I am using Aggorth [v4]

The error I’m getting is: “java.net.UnknownHostException: www.insidious.com”

I thought it had to do with MySQL, but I installed that and it didn’t help- MySQL is set to my IP.

Read full topic
